title: ECO Report - Organic Product Flow Settlement

actions.exportTooltip: Download report in Excel format with 3 tabs (suppliers, raw materials, finished products)

info.title: ECO Report Information
info.description: The report generates an Excel spreadsheet compliant with organic control requirements. It contains 3 tabs: suppliers, raw materials and finished products. Fields marked in yellow require manual completion (supplier eco certificate data).
info.autoFields: Auto fields: names, addresses, quantities, stock levels

suppliers.name: Supplier name
suppliers.manualHint: This field requires manual completion in the exported Excel file

empty.title: Select period and generate report
empty.description: Set the date range and click "Preview data" to view data or "Export Excel" to download the file.

errors.invalidDateRange: Start date cannot be later than end date

tab1.title: Tab.1 for processing/trade/import category
tab1.subtitle: Information about suppliers and purchased organic products for the period {{periodFrom}} to {{periodTo}}
tab1.footnote1: the flow settlement is carried out from the last mandatory inspection to the date of the inspection planned for the current year; if production at the plant level is settled on a monthly basis, the last day of the month preceding the inspection can be considered the end of the product settlement period;
tab1.footnote2: all necessary information to fill in the above table can be found on copies of supplier certificates, which should be available for inspection on the day of the audit.

tab2.title: Tab.2 for processing category
tab2.subtitle: Organic raw materials flow settlement for the period from {{periodFrom}} to {{periodTo}}
tab2.instruction: Fill the table in weight or volume units

headers.purchases:
raw material purchase
(total purchase in
a given assortment)
headers.ownProduction:
own production (in
case of
semi-finished products**)
headers.otherExpenses:
other raw material expenses
(e.g. extraordinary losses,
transfer to non-organic
production)

tab2.footnote1: *a raw material is a product intended for further processing;
tab2.footnote2: **a semi-finished product manufactured at the plant level should be included in the raw materials table if it is subject to further processing; however, if it is sold/released externally, it is treated as a finished product and should be included in table 3 (finished products)

tab3.title: Tab.3 for processing/trade/import category
tab3.subtitle: Organic finished products flow settlement for the period from {{periodFrom}} to {{periodTo}}
tab3.instruction: Data should be provided in weight or volume units. In the case of data in pieces, information about the weight/volume of the packaging of individual products should be attached.

headers.purchases:
product purchase
(total purchase in
a given assortment)

tab3.footnote: The table covers the assortment manufactured at the plant and/or purchased for further marketing.
